name: Salmon Alfredo Bow Ties
preparation: In a Multipurpose Pot - 12 cup, cook pasta according to package directions. Stir in snow peas and frozen peas for last 1 min of cooking. Strain and reserve 1 cup pasta cooking water.
Meanwhile, in a sauté pan, combine sauce mix with milk. Whisking constantly, bring to a boil over medium-high, reduce heat, and simmer 3 min or until thickened.
Stir in drained pasta and veggies and salmon. If needed, stir in some of the reserved pasta cooking water, a little at time, to reach desired consistency.
tips: Get more nutrients and fiber from our meal - add more veggies or 1–2 spiralized zucchini.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup arugula on top of each plate.
